quote: Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious, and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't try to do things. You simply must do things.
name: Albert Einstein
title: Film Director, Netflix

quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them. Creative work is not about perfection, it's about connection and authenticity.
name: Maya Rodriguez
title: Creative Director, HBO

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. Every project should push boundaries and challenge the status quo.
name: James Chen
title: Producer, Disney+

quote: Storytelling is the most powerful way to put ideas into the world today. Every frame should serve the narrative and emotional journey.
name: Sarah Johnson
title: Executive Producer, Amazon
